Description.Text:
A 4 stars hotel in the region preferred by the Ottoman Sultans, in the center of the mystical history of Istanbul, Hotel Prince. The hotel which was renovated late 2008, is offering by its experienced staff and comfortable rooms a service fit for Ottoman Sultans in its 123 rooms decorated with minimal style, where you can feel the sweet smell of history. Hotel Prince which is situated in the center of history, is awaiting for you in Istanbul which's one of the old names is "Dersaadet" (the gate of happiness) and which is shining all around although it has the smell of sadness...
The Topkap Palace where the Ottoman Empire has been directed for 380 years, the Bab-I Ali which was the building of the Grand Viziers, The Museum of Saint Sophie which is a former patriarchal basilica, and the Sultanahmet hippodrome are only 5 minutes far by walk.
The famous Grand Bazaar where the old wealthy Ottoman people were keeping their valuable belongings such as jewelries, valuable metals, furs and bejeweled arms as well as the considerable quantity of the Empire's treasure, and now displaying the most important examples of the traditional Turkish art is twinkling with all the treasures it is keeping. And also the Egyptian Bazaar.

2 minutes by walk to the center of the quarter 18 km's from Atatrk Airport 3 minutes by walk to Sirkeci Train Station 3 minutes by walk to Glhane tramway stop 5 minutes by walk to Eminn bus stop and city line ferry port 1 stop only by tramway to historical baths and Turkish baths . Art activities and art galleries, souvenirs shops, soap shops, aromatic tea shops, snack bars and mini markets around the hotel
The historical places: The Topkap Palace is 5 minutes away by walk The Hagia Sophia Museum is 5 minutes away by walk Sultanahmet Mosque is 5 minutes away by walk The Cistern Basilica is 5 minutes away by walk The Archeological Museum is 5 minutes away by walk The Egyptian Bazaar is 5 minutes away by walk The Grand Bazaar is 10 minutes away by walk Doubank is 3 minutes away by walk You may reach Taksim Square in the City Center in 10 minutes by tramway.

Standard Room - LCD TV, satellite, kettle and coffee, mini-bar, direct dial phone, cold /hot air conditioning, hair dryer, safe box and room service for 24 hours. Observation hole on the room's door Fire exit on every floor Extra phone in the bathrooms Desk, reading lamp Wireless free of charge internet with access all around in the hotel Laundry and dry cleaning service "Clean air area" application is in priority in the whole general areas of the hotel. The entrance is granite tiled and the rest of the floor is wall to wall carpet. The carpets and the wall papers in the rooms are noninflammable. Magnetic card keys Carry cots and baby carriers are available free of charge, if needed.
Double with SPA access - Free SPA access, LCD TV, satellite, kettle and coffee, mini-bar, direct dial phone, cold /hot air conditioning, hair dryer, safe box and room service for 24 hours. Observation hole on the room's door Fire exit on every floor Extra phone in the bathrooms Desk, reading lamp Wireless free of charge internet with access all around in the hotel Laundry and dry cleaning service "Clean air area" application is in priority in the whole general areas of the hotel. The entrance is granite tiled and the rest of the floor is wall to wall carpet. The carpets and the wall papers in the rooms are noninflammable. Magnetic card keys Carry cots and baby carriers are available free of charge, if needed.
Deluxe Room - LCD TV, satellite, kettle and coffee, mini-bar, direct dial phone, cold /hot air conditioning, hair dryer, safe box and room service for 24 hours. Observation hole on the room's door Fire exit on every floor Extra phone in the bathrooms Desk, reading lamp Wireless free of charge internet with access all around in the hotel Laundry and dry cleaning service "Clean air area" application is in priority in the whole general areas of the hotel.
19 Deluxe rooms in total Delightful decoration in minimalist style Magnetic Card Keys Balconies with unique Istanbul view. All the rooms with balcony have sea view, while 8 rooms have both sea view and view on Topkap Museum, Glhane Park and Hagia Sophia Museum. Our rooms have spacious bathrooms or hot tub. There is also bathrobe service. Carry cots and baby carriers are available free of charge, if needed.
Junior Suite - LCD TV, satellite, kettle and coffee, mini-bar, direct dial phone, cold /hot air conditioning, hair dryer, safe box and room service for 24 hours. Observation hole on the room's door Fire exit on every floor Extra phone in the bathrooms Desk, reading lamp Wireless free of charge internet with access all around in the hotel Laundry and dry cleaning service "Clean air area" application is in priority in the whole general areas of the hotel.
Magnetic card keys Jacuzzi Our Junior Suit rooms are of 2 types with Bosphorus or city view, as well as the city or the magnificent Bosphorus view you may also contemplate the Topkap Museum, Gulhane Park and Hagia Sophia Museum from these rooms. Carry cots and baby carriers are available free of charge, if needed.
Family Room - LCD TV, satellite, kettle and coffee, mini-bar, direct dial phone, cold /hot air conditioning, hair dryer, safe box and room service for 24 hours. Observation hole on the room's door Fire exit on every floor Extra phone in the bathrooms Desk, reading lamp Wireless free of charge internet with access all around in the hotel Laundry and dry cleaning service "Clean air area" application is in priority in the whole general areas of the hotel.
The "main door" situated in front of the rooms composed of two separate rooms can be closed and a mini aisle can be created between the rooms. A capacity of 4 or 5 persons maximum Magnetic Card Keys Carry cots and baby carriers are available free of charge, if needed.
